channel.title: Comments on: For Those that Don’t Understand Twitter

item.title: By: Vic
item.dc:creator: Vic
item.description: Well, it's microblogging. Same idea. When I meet people "in the flesh" but I've read their blog, we have something to talk about. I know where they are coming from, or at least one facet of their direction.
item.content:encoded: Well, it’s microblogging. Same idea. When I meet people “in the flesh” but I’ve read their blog, we have something to talk about. I know where they are coming from, or at least one facet of their direction.
